1370: Maelkin moved to Uterechse straet.B.1 after marriage.
Got married to Scilla at age 28 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Scilla, Hersewindis, at age 28.
1373: Had a daughter with Scilla, Verthwi, at age 31.
1375: Had a son with Scilla, Snelgerus, at age 33.
1377: Had a daughter with Scilla, Agnes, at age 35.
1379: Had a daughter with Scilla, Lenildis, at age 37.
1381: Had a daughter with Scilla, Geile, at age 39.
1383: Had a daughter with Scilla, Sipper, at age 41.
1384: Had a son with Scilla, Ivone, at age 42.
1387: Lost son Ivone when Ivone was 4 years old.
